description.value:
Starting at 3rd level when you choose this conclave, you learn the mage hand cantrip if you do not already know it. When you cast it, the hand takes the form of your swarming nature spirits.

Furthermore, you gain an additional spell which is always prepare for you when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Swarmkeeper Spells table.

These spells do not count against the number of spells you can prepare each day. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you even if it does not appear on the ranger spell list.

Swarmkeeper Spells
Ranger LevelSpell
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.q9dRmKVVPACexAmk]{Faerie Fire}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.FwogPY2YPI8m6B1F]{Web}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.nziWfOYRpN1xj3Gb]{Gaseous Form}
13th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.SDhKwutWDOIL2lV9]{Arcane Eye}
17th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.W5L7hvPyzVCShFgA]{Insect Plague}
